questions.question: This arc is where Luffy first demonstrates Gear Second and Gear Third while battling against CP9. What is...?
This arc is the first in the series and introduces Monkey D. Luffy and his aspiration to become the Pirate King. What is...?
Taking place on a unique island, this arc introduces the character of Chopper, a reindeer with the ability to transform. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to manipulate and become light. What is...?
This devil fruit allows its user to create tremors capable of causing massive destruction, and was notably used by one of the Yonko. What is...?
This ability, used by a former Warlord of the Sea, allows the manipulation of shadows. What is...?
This lesser-known member of the Revolutionary Army is recognized for his ability to create powerful winds and for being the second-in-command to Monkey D. Dragon. Who is...?
This former captain of the Sun Pirates and fish-man is known for his tragic past and his nickname 'Jinbe the Knight of the Sea'. Who is...?
This character, a former member of the Roger Pirates and known for his light-light fruit powers, played a significant role in the Void Century. Who is...?
